item.title: KMI
item.description: score:1043 Chances: Pipeline giant Kinder Morgan (NYSE: KMI) is a high-yield dividend stock with a yield of 6.2%. Kinder Morgan has spent the last eight years reviving its image after dividend cut in 2015. Kinder Morgan’s ability to secure high-return expansion projects to grow cash flow is a positive.
